welcome_message_body: Welcome to Vihiga, Kenya! Get ready to experience the charm of this vibrant city known for its beautiful landscapes, rich cultural heritage, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Vihiga has to offer. Karibu sana! (You are very welcome!)

restaurants.name: Greens Hotel
restaurants.description: Greens Hotel is a african restaurant located in the city.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kisumu Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kakamega Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kakamega Airport is used for the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.
